alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:43AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Kimball and southern Laramie Counties through 130 AM MDT... At 1242 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Natural Fort to Hereford to 10 miles northeast of Pawnee Buttes. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Kimball, Pine Bluffs, Burns, Oliver Campground, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Panorama Point, Ranchettes, Oliver Reservoir, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, Kimball Airport, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Carpenter, Bushnell, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 26. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 351 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
